description:
Using the following credentials to Sign In
email address: p.s.farwaha@gmail.com

Make sure user lands on the home page

steps.stepDescription: Open the web browser and navigate to the URL https://www.marcusmillichap.com/
Click the Sign In/Out option to reveal the login form on the page
Enter the email address 'p.s.farwaha@gmail.com' into the email field
Click the Continue button to display the password field
Enter the password 'GeckDemo05' into the password field
Submit the login form to attempt sign in
Verify that the home page loads by checking for the text 'Global Reach, Local Expertise'
Capture a screenshot of the home page to confirm successful sign in

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Authenticate and verify home page display
